summary: Adds a craftable/temperable set of heavy glass armor with the same stats as ebony armor.
descriptionHtml:
Please endorse and comment on how I can improve my mod, Thanks :)

Adds a craftable/temperable set of heavy glass armor with the same stats as ebony armor.

the optional file lets you wear circlets with the heavy glass helmet.

The texture I am using in the screenshots is: BGM Glass and Elven Armor and Weapons By: cmdo.
The sword is from \"Lost LongSwords\" By: MrBrownStone.

Compatibility:

Better fitting Glass Helmet By: abakus
BGM Glass and Elven Armor and Weapons By: cmdo
aMidianborn Book of Silence By: CaBaL120

Installation:
1. download with NMM
2. Activate
3. Enjoy!

Uninstallation:
1. deactivate in NMM

Please endorse and comment on how I can improve my mod, Thanks :)
author: Betelguse16
